about_the_game:
A unique blend of roguelike deckbuilding and survival strategy, where you control your characters only with your cards. You not only play your actions, but also decide who to perform them. Can you break the time loop and lead your team to safety, or will you die trying?

Build your team

Explore the island and search for other survivors. Unite your team from a diverse cast of characters, each with their unique abilities, bonuses, and Disaster cards!

Your team is more than just a list of names - their synergies with your actions, buildings, and perks can heavily influence the directions you'll take with your deck. All characters have different strengths and weaknesses, so picking the right members to perform the right tasks is crucial.

Exploit chain reactions

Build chain reactions consisting of perks, buildings, characters, and more! Maximize the impact of each action, and pull off exciting combos to fight back all the threats that are out there to get you!

Discover new technologies

Research new technologies to improve your deck and increase your chances of survival. Each new card can also unlock new challenges and subsequent upgrades, so always keep an eye on what other cards are added to your decks when deciding what to research!

Explore unique locations

Many locations are waiting to be discovered. Send your team to expeditions and find exciting gear, or learn new technologies that can fundamentally change the rules of the game. But beware, explorations also pose a high risk to your characters, so be mindful of who you send!

Journey through the time loop

Confront the boss of each time loop and defeat them to unlock unique perks that can leverage the power of your deck! Perks can fundamentally change how you approach deckbuilding, so taking full advantage of them is important!

Each run is different

Pick your win condition from a wide range of scenarios, that heavily influence what cards will be available in each run. Combos that were present previously might not be available here, so it's a constant battle of improvisation and adaptation.

Wishlist now

Add to your wishlist now, to get notified of updates and an upcoming demo!

name: Temporal Shore

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® XP
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium®4 1.5GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 or better
  • Processor: Intel i3 @ 2GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • DirectX: Version 11
